pets.name: Waly
pets.description: Waly is a very quiet cat that loves hugs who gets along with animals as well as children, he will be perfect for a family. Waly is up-to-date on her vaccinations and has been spayed.

pets.name: Fluffy
pets.description: Fluffy is a sweet and playful 2-year-old Persian cat. She loves to cuddle and play with toys, and gets along well with other animals. Fluffy is up-to-date on her vaccinations and has been spayed.

pets.name: Buddy
pets.description: Buddy is a friendly and energetic 5-year-old Labrador Retriever. He enjoys going for walks and playing fetch, and is great with kids. Buddy is up-to-date on his vaccinations and has been neutered.

pets.name: Samantha
pets.description: Samantha is a cute and curious 1-year-old Dutch rabbit. She loves to hop around and explore her surroundings, and is very social. Samantha is up-to-date on her vaccinations and has been spayed.

pets.name: Max
pets.description: Max is a handsome and friendly 4-year-old Siamese cat. He loves to cuddle and be around people, and has a playful personality. Max is up-to-date on his vaccinations and has been neutered.
